answers.answer: Do you do drugs? Street drugs, and some Rx drugs can have this effect. Cocaine, narcotics, antidepressants, meth, and many others can cause this? If you do not do any drugs, blood pressure or diabetes can cause this as well...more so high blood pressure. If it continues, you may need to be seen by a doctor and discuss it with him/her.
yea, drugs and alcohol is a factor sometimes, also some stimulants and other meds, y not try some natural way to help you increase your sexual appetite

title: Im 17 years old why am i having trouble keeping it up??
